custom_params.label: S>SQ
custom_params.tooltip: Mutate sine into square via high-gain clipping. Pure sine at 0, aggressive square at 1.

custom_params.label: S>SW
custom_params.tooltip: Mutate sine into saw via phase distortion. Pure sine at 0, sharp sawtooth at 1.

custom_params.label: MIX
custom_params.tooltip: Balance between Square shaper (min) and Saw shaper (max).

custom_params.label: SYM
custom_params.tooltip: DC bias injection. Creates PWM on square branch and slope tilt on saw branch.

custom_params.label: SAT
custom_params.tooltip: Final analog warmth and harmonic glue via tanh drive.
